product_name: REI Lightweight Fleet Quarter-Zip Shirt - Men's
long_description: Fend off chilly weather and enjoy your workout in the REI Lightweight Fleet Quarter-Zip shirt. Soft polyester comfortably moves with you during motion, and mesh panels enhance ventilation. Moisture-wicking fabric dries fast so you won't feel chilled when a breeze kicks up; antimicrobial treatment helps prevent funky odors. Standard polyester is blended with S.Cafe(R) polyester that incorporates recycled coffee grounds to help fabric wick moisture and dry quickly. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered pocket on left arm stashes small items such as a debit card or key, and it features a port for your earphones. Quarter-length zipper ventilates instantly, thumbholes warm wrists and dropped hem increases rear coverage. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. The REI Lightweight Fleet Quarter-Zip shirt offers an active fit that allow a full range of motion.
short_description: Fend off chilly weather and enjoy your workout in the REI Lightweight Fleet Quarter-Zip shirt.
